seriesJson.title: Toward a new world
seriesJson.description: Lectures recorded at San Diego State College's 25th Annual Institute on World Affairs. The Institute brings together world leaders to discuss issues in politics, culture, science, and more.

node.title: A new foreign policy for the United States, part two
